author: Julian Baker
title: Deutsche Bank marketing EUR500m long 7yr hypo pfand at MS-8 area
text:
LONDON, Feb 14 (IFR) -
* Guidance MS-8 area, EUR500m no-grow, tbp today. Due 21 Aug 2025, pay 21 Feb, German law, Frankfurt listing, 1k/1k denoms, Reg S Tefra D, ISIN DE000DL19T67. Short first coupon. DB is B&D. (8am)
Deutsche Bank AG has mandated Deutsche Bank, Commerzbank, Natixis, SG CIB and Swedbank to lead manage its forthcoming EUR 500mn (no grow) RegS bearer, ECB eligible, Hypothekenpfandbrief (Mortgage-backed Covered Bond). The issue is expected to be rated Aaa by Moodyâ€™s and will bear a long 7y maturity. The transaction is expected to be launched in the near future, subject to market conditions. Manufacturer target market (MIFID II product governance): Eligible Counterparties, Professional and Retail clients (all distribution channels). No KID necessary. (8am)
